safeTreatmentAbroad.title: Safe Treatment Abroad: Why Europe & Turkey Are Your Top Choices in 2025
safeTreatmentAbroad.subtitle: Experience world-class medical care with peace of mind in Germany, Turkey, and Spain.

1.heading: 1. Rising Demand for Safe Treatment Abroad
points: Global medical tourism market to exceed $200B by 2030
Patients seek stability: from infection control to transparent pricing

2.heading: 2. How Stress Impacts Recovery
points: Chronic Stress & Immunity: Anxiety slows healing & raises complication risks.
Psychosomatic Effects: Reducing stress by 30% can improve chemo efficacy and speed up post-op rehab.
Healing Environments: Warm climates in Spain, serene landscapes in Turkey, and organized German clinics foster faster recovery.

4.heading: 4. How to Begin Your Journey
points: Online Consultation: Initial case review via your medical records
Clinic & Doctor Selection: Based on ratings, reviews, and success rates
Logistics & Support: Flight, transfer, accommodation, interpreter services
24/7 Coordination: Dedicated medical coordinator available round-the-clock
